📌How to Use the Steganography Tool App

Features:
✅ Convert text into images
✅ Convert one image into another
✅ Decode hidden messages from images

Encoding (Hiding Text into an Image):
1. Open the app and navigate to the Text-to-Image section.
2. Enter the secret text message you want to hide.
3. Select an image where you want to hide the text.
4. Click the "Encode" button.
5. Save or share the encoded image.

Encoding (Hiding One Image Inside Another):
1. Open the app and go to the Image-to-Image section.
2. Select the cover image (the visible image).
3. Select the hidden image (the one to be encoded inside).
4. Click the "Encode" button.
5. Save or share the encoded image.

Decoding (Extracting Hidden Data):
1. Open the app and navigate to the Decode section.
2. Select the steganographic image that contains hidden data.
3. Click the "Decode" button.
4. If the image contains hidden text, it will be displayed.
5. If the image contains another hidden image, it will be extracted and shown.
